trans-unit.source: Declares the base type of the container control of a property that returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> interface and is marked with the TemplateContainerAttribute attribute.
trans-unit.target: 声明该属性返回的容器控件的基类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref>接口，并在用 TemplateContainerAttribute 特性标记。

trans-unit.source: The control with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> property must implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.INamingContainer"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 与控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref>属性必须实现<xref href="System.Web.UI.INamingContainer"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> object that is passed in as a parameter of the TemplateContainerAttribute object is used by the parser as the type of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object that is used in data-binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>作为 TemplateContainerAttribute 对象的参数传递的对象由分析器的类型用作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>在数据绑定表达式中使用的对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The control whose property returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface and is marked with the TemplateContainerAttribute, must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 其属性返回的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>接口并使用 TemplateContainerAttribute 标记，必须实现<xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute"></xref> class using the specified container type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute"></xref>类使用指定的容器类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute"></xref> class using the specified container type and the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute.BindingDirection*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute"></xref>类使用指定的容器类型和<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute.BindingDirection*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateContainerAttribute.BindingDirection*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding direction of the container control.
trans-unit.target: 获取容器控件的绑定方向。

trans-unit.source: The BindingDirection property can be either the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection> field, where the template can accept only property values or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection> field, where the template can accept and expose property values.
trans-unit.target: BindingDirection 属性可以是<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection>字段，其中模板只会接受属性值或<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection>字段，其中模板可接受，并公开的属性值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection>

trans-unit.source: In the latter scenario, data-bound controls automatically can use the update, delete, and insert operations of a data source using the `Bind` data-binding syntax.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种方案中，数据绑定控件自动可以使用更新、 删除和插入操作的数据源使用`Bind`数据绑定语法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[数据绑定表达式概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection"></xref> indicating the container control's binding direction.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BindingDirection"> </xref> ，该值指示容器控件的绑定方向。
